DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the psychometric validity of FASS (Facial Summary Score Scale) to assess postoperative children pain.
DOC.brief_title: FASS (Facial Action Summary Score) Scale to Differentiate the Pain of Postoperative Anxiety in Children Under 7 Years
DOC.criteria: Children surgery Younger than 7 years old Elective surgery Patient whose parents will have given their nonopposition Psychological retardation Chronic pain
